long_description: The perfect assistant for your two-wheeled adventures, the Haiku Handlebar Tote straps on to your bicycle handlebar to carry your iPad or other tablet computer as well as other daily essentials. Recycled polyethylene is made from plastic beverage bottles; this textured fabric is durable and soft, yet tough. 2 simple handlebar attachment straps loop on to handlebars with rip-and-stick tabs; works for virtually all handlebars and detaches when not in use. Includes key fob attachment that doubles as a handlebar stem attachment. Includes short straps for hand carrying and long straps for wearing cross-body. Haiku recommends the Handelbar Tote for use with cruisers only. Secure snap closure at top; internal zip and open pockets. Closeout.
short_description: The perfect assistant for your two-wheeled adventures, the Haiku Handlebar Tote straps on to your bicycle handlebar to carry your iPad or other tablet computer as well as other daily essentials.
